extendedInfo.description: DAVAO LIFE Mobile ApplicationThe City Government of Davao is promoting tourism and investment to the rest of the world through digital technology and information.Owned by the City Government of Davao and maintained by the Davao City Information Office, the Davao Life Android application boasts of updated data and information on the four major festivals of Davao City.Live video broadcast of festival events via web which allows us to connect and share in real-time, to our potential tourists from all over.It consists of active composite sites 1.	Davao Life! â which has data relevant to local and international tourists2.	 Kadayawan â which contains the information about the history, events and other 	information related to the festivalSoon, the same mobile application will have pages on Araw ng Dabaw, Pasko Fiesta and Summer Fest.  With the mobile app showcasing the festival that the City celebrates every quarter, we hope to get the interest of foreign and domestic travelers and make Davao their destination choice.The Davao mobile app is the first tourism mobile application owned and published by a local government unit.

reviews.title: Wow1
reviews.comment: OK kaayo! Sa tanang government app nga akong gidownload kani ang pinaka intuitive so far! Mejo dugay lang ang pagload sa mga page, maybe pwede niu itake advantage ang swipe ability sa android...salamat davao! Padayon sa pag uswag!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: One of the best City apps ever!
reviews.comment: Padayun sa pag-uswag Dabaw!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Sa tanang nag mugna ani nga app salamat. Dakong tabang ni namo nga wala sa dakbayan hilabi na namong mga ofw
reviews.author: ron leonor

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Super clear ng pictures . Sayang lng kc hnd mo pwedeng gawing wallpaper..sana ma update
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: UI Experience Recommendation
reviews.comment: Icon: Make use of a generic representation of Davao Tourism. Make it represent the \"Davao Tourism\" not just the \"Kadayawan Event/ plain eagle\". maybe the logo \"DaVaO Life is Here\". Make it a rounded square icon and bevel effect. Make it more of a classy modern app. Dynamic Transition: Make use of Google APIs. A preset dynamic format included within the app itself; not just merely a loaded page effect. (eg. dynamic edge swipe, Loading transition, etc...) Theme: Make the app theme more of in accordance to Android latest build theme (eg modern loading circle, button picture, higher resolution pictures especially for HD phones like S3, etc...).  ~anyway, congrats Davao! the first LGU in the Philippines to have a mobile app. Making use of social media and technology for tourism. Great one!
reviews.author: BoyingSki Quimpo
